meanings.sent1: The inaptly colored shoes did not match her outfit at all.
meanings.sent2: He inaptly wore a winter coat in the scorching summer heat.
meanings.sent3: The penguin inaptly tried to fly with its tiny wings.
meanings.sent4: Her inaptly timed joke fell flat in the serious meeting.
meanings.sent5: The inaptly placed sign led us in the wrong direction.

meanings.sent1: The inaptly chosen font made the text hard to read.
meanings.sent2: She inaptly picked a horror movie for the children's party.
meanings.sent3: The inaptly matched socks became a fashion statement.
meanings.sent4: His inaptly timed arrival interrupted the surprise party.
meanings.sent5: The inaptly selected ingredients ruined the recipe.
